name: Corporate Blue
description: プロフェッショナルで信頼感のあるビジネス向けテーマ
mood: 信頼性、プロフェッショナル、安定感
use_cases: 企業向けダッシュボード

button.primary: bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700 active:bg-primary-800 text-white font-medium rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors duration-200
button.secondary: bg-secondary-100 hover:bg-secondary-200 text-secondary-900 font-medium rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors duration-200
button.outline: border-2 border-primary-600 text-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-50 font-medium rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors duration-200

card.default: bg-white border border-neutral-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm p-6
card.elevated: bg-white border border-neutral-200 rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6

input.default: border border-neutral-300 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-transparent
input.error: border border-error-500 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-error-500 focus:border-transparent

badge.primary: bg-primary-100 text-primary-800 text-xs font-semibold px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full
badge.success: bg-success-100 text-success-800 text-xs font-semibold px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full
badge.warning: bg-warning-100 text-warning-800 text-xs font-semibold px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full
badge.error: bg-error-100 text-error-800 text-xs font-semibold px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full
